item.title: Who I am
item.description: I help make your discoveries accessible, fast, and reproducible. In studying to become an applied mathematician, I discovered a love for using computers as my research laboratory. (the links below are placeholders for buttons) RESUME CV (WEBSITE)

item.title: let's connect
item.description: I am available for consulting on Python, MLOps, and several other discplines related to the research-to-production process and applied computational mathematics. Your email: Your message: Send

item.title: the oracle
item.description: TK: show screenshot (AKA the Monte-Carlo Calculator) (AKA the Fermi Problem Machine) The Oracle is a web app I built to help me make quick estimates without keeping them in my head (and then share them!). Often we find “back-of-the-napkin” calculations to be useful… randall munroe what if … fermi problems wiki … TK TK TK It is deployed with #kubernetes on #google-cloud-platform and is built with #python using #flask.
